chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (A : Set) (l0 l1 : list A) (x : A), insertion A x l0 l1 -> forall (l2 : list A) (y : A), insertion A y l1 l2 -> exists l3 : list A, insertion A y l0 l3 /\ insertion A x l3 l2

Premises:
insertion : forall A : Set, A -> list A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments T
insertion_sind : forall (A : Set) (P : A -> list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x l (x :: l)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> P x l l' -> P x (y :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (y : A) (l l0 : list A), insertion A y l l0 -> P y l l0
insertion_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : A -> list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x l (x :: l)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> P x l l' -> P x (y :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (y : A) (l l0 : list A), insertion A y l l0 -> P y l l0
Forall2_app_inv_r : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1' l2' : list B) (l : list A), Forall2 R l (l1' ++ l2') -> exists l1 l2 : list A, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l = l1 ++ l2
tail_insertion : forall (A : Set) (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> insertion A x (y :: l) (y :: l')
app_inv_tail : forall (A : Type) (l l1 l2 : list A), l1 ++ l = l2 ++ l -> l1 = l2
app_inv_head : forall (A : Type) (l l1 l2 : list A), l ++ l1 = l ++ l2 -> l1 = l2
insertion_inclusion : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> forall y : A, In y l -> In y l'
in_insertion : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l' : list A, insertion A x l' l
is_permutation_sind : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall l l' : list A, is_permutation A l l' -> P l l' -> forall (x : A) (l'' : list A), insertion A x l' l'' -> P (x :: l) l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, is_permutation A l l0 -> P l l0
is_permutation_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall l l' : list A, is_permutation A l l' -> P l l' -> forall (x : A) (l'' : list A), insertion A x l' l'' -> P (x :: l) l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, is_permutation A l l0 -> P l l0
in_insertion_inv : forall (A : Set) (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A y l l' -> In x l' -> x = y \/ In x l
Forall2_app_inv_l : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A) (l' : list B), Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) l' -> exists l1' l2' : list B, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l' = l1' ++ l2'
insertion_in : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> In x l'
head_insertion : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l : list A), insertion A x l (x :: l)
is_set_insertion_in : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A) (x : A), insertion A x l l' -> is_set A l' -> ~ In x l
insertion_is_permutation : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A) (x : A), insertion A x l l' -> is_permutation A (x :: l) l'
is_set_insertion : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A) (x : A), insertion A x l l' -> is_set A l' -> is_set A l
insertion_snoc : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (xs : list A), insertion A x xs (xs ++ x :: nil)
insertion_is_set : forall (A : Set) (l : list A), is_set A l -> forall x : A, ~ In x l -> forall l' : list A, insertion A x l l' -> is_set A l'
concat_app : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list (list A)), concat (l1 ++ l2) = concat l1 ++ concat l2
cons_is_permutation : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A), is_permutation A l l' -> forall (x : A) (l'' : list A), insertion A x l' l'' -> is_permutation A (x :: l) l''
Permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Permutation l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, Permutation l l' -> P l l' -> Permutation l' l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, Permutation l l0 -> P l l0
skipn_app : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), skipn n (l1 ++ l2) = skipn n l1 ++ skipn (n - length l1) l2
Add_sind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
partition_cons2 : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (a : A) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> f a = false -> partition f (a :: l) = (l1, a :: l2)
in_map_iff : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), In y (map f l) < -> (exists x : A, f x = y /\ In x l)
Inductive is_permutation (A : Set) : list A -> list A -> Prop := nil_is_permutation : is_permutation A nil nil | cons_is_permutation : forall l l' : list A, is_permutation A l l' -> forall (x : A) (l'' : list A), insertion A x l' l'' -> is_permutation A (x :: l) l'' Arguments is_permutation _%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments nil_is_permutation _%type_scope Arguments cons_is_permutation _%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope _ _ _%list_scope
Forall2_cons : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l')
app_eq_unit : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), x ++ y = a :: nil -> x = nil /\ y = a :: nil \/ x = a :: nil /\ y = nil
